content:
Solution Title: Personal Gym Set-Up
| Solution Description                                                                                         | Features                                               | Competitors                                      | Differentiator                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------------|--------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Create a home gym setup designed to cater to the specific needs of the individual gym-goer.                | 1. Maximize the use of space                             | BodyBoss, TRX, Total Gym                         | A personalized experience that is tailored-made to the individualâ€™s gym routine and preference, at the comfort of their home. Eliminating the need to go to overcrowded gyms which is one of the main issues gym goers face.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| Personalised workout plan with 1-on-1 virtual coaching sessions to optimize use of equipment and routines. | 2. Provide a customized workout plan with exercises       | Peloton, Tonal, Echelon Connect                     | A one-on-one virtual coaching session that ensures accountability and helps maximize the use of equipment and routines through personalized support.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |                                                                                                           
| Offer a rental service in which an experienced trainer provides the gym-goer with the equipment of their choice. | 3. Access to a variety of equipment                    | Fitness Gear, Rent Gym Equipment, Gym Equipment Rent | A hassle-free home workout experience, providing the necessary gym equipment whilst keeping costs low.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |  
| Create an e-commerce platform that provides gym-goers with workout equipment.                             | 4. Easy-to-shop E-commerce                               | Rogue Fitness, Titan Fitness, American Barbell     | An online marketplace that caters to gym-goers while offering high-quality equipment at an affordable price.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                                                                                                           
| Offer gym membership redeemable at non-peak hours, and 1-on-1 training sessions with an experienced coach.  | 5. Flexible Timing and Personalized Training Sessions | Crunch Fitness, LA Fitness, Retro Fitness           | Allows for personalized workout sessions with an experienced coach, along with the convenience of redeeming gym memberships during non-peak hours.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |                                                      
  

Note: The focus of the solutions is to eliminate overcrowding in gyms and also provide personalized gym services for gym-goers.
pain_point_description: many gym-goers complain about overcrowded gyms, making it difficult to access equipment or work out
